resumeExperiencia: Summarize your experience in one headline
valorPositivo: What do you like about this home?
valorNegativo: What do you dislike about this home?
recomendarias: Would you recommend this home to a friend?
cuentanosCosasBuenas: Tell us about the positive things of the home
cuentanosMejorias: Tell us about the improvements you would make to the house
estaInformacion: This information is addressed to other people who want to live in your apartment. Let them know the good and bad things about living there.
